messages.content: My passion is helping local people; you deserve politicians who are on your side. That's what has always driven me on - doing my best to fight for the best people in the land, because you deserve better.

leaflet.personalStatement: My passion is helping local people; you deserve politicians who are on your side. That's what has always driven me on - doing my best to fight for the best people in the land, because you deserve better.

images.caption: Nick Palmer outside a community centre
